Item.Name: MARVEL COMIC RADIO AD SCRIPT:CAPTAIN AMERICA
Item.Description: INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS WELCOME! BID NOW:THIS AUCTION CAN END AT ANY TIME! Hello, Marvel Comics superheroes! This auction is for a comic book store RADIO SCRIPTS booklet. The cover features Avengers leader CAPTAIN AMERICA (with art by DC artist Kevin Maguire). With this radio station ad script kit, Marvel encouraged retailers to create their own co-op advertisements for on-the-air radio broadcasting spots, and these scripts were designed as a fun way for comic books stores to perform and record their radio ads "the Marvel Way". The scripts in this booklet promoted titles such as the Amazing Spider-man, Capt America, the Silver Surfer, Daredevil, the Avengers, Ghost Rider, Conan the Barbarian, the Uncanny X-Men, the Incredible Hulk, the Fantastic Four, etc. This extremely RARE Marvel artifact came out in 1992, and was sent absolutely, strictly, to comic book retail shops to boost sales of trade paperback & graphic novel releases, comic books, etc. This item is in UNUSED NEAR MINT condition. Remember to check out OTHER similar Marvel promos such as this in my other auctions! PLEASE READ TERMS BEFORE BIDDING: Win more than 1 spectacular auction & SAVE ON SHIPPING when items are paid for together. I ship QUICKLY and your items will be packed VERY WELL! (Check my feedback!) USA winners pay $3.50 for postage/handling/insurance. NEW YORK STATE RESIDENTS: Please add the appropriate NYS sales tax for your County for the total amount (high bid plus postage/handling/insurance amount). Canadian winners pay $3.50 for postage/handling/insurance & pay by Paypal, Bidpay, Billpoint, Citybank C2it, or international POSTAL money orders only, payable in US dollars. No checks accepted, unfortunately. All other countries pay $7.50 shipping & handling for airmail shipping. Payment can be made by Paypal, Bidpay, Billpoint, Citybank C2it, or international POSTAL money orders only, payable in US dollars. Sorry, but no checks accepted. Payment to be received within 10 days of auction's end. Thanks very much Super-heroes, and remember to aim your web shooter at my OTHER AUCTIONS! Item.Name: HARMONY KINGDOM ~ ARIA AMOROSA ~ RETIRED
Item.Description: HARMONY KINGDOM ~ ARIA AMOROSA ~ RETIRED Name: Aria Amorosa Artist: Peter Calvesbert Item No: TJES Collection Name: Treasure Jest Subset Name: Small Treasure Jest Exclusive To: Made In: England Status: Retired Carving Date: 1997 Release Date: 1/1/1998 In Store Date: Retirement Date: 7/1/1998 Edition Size: 9530 US Issue Price in USD: $45 UK Issue Price in GBP: 29.5 CAN Issue Price in CND: $70 Category: Box Figurine Dimensions (Inches): 1.93 x 2.83 x 2.95 S e c r e t s This box figurine depicts two seals, lovingly entwined, mouths open in song. A plimsol line with numerical markings runs down the belly of one of them, a representation of the amount of oil that can be extracted from an elephant seal. Peter carved the cigarette lighter under the other seal s flipper after a beach-combing trip in North Wales where he found the beach littered with plastic lighters. Peter s mouse looks out startled from under another flipper. The inspiration for the rat carved inside was a topical news item that Peter misheard on the radio at the time of carving: the monster rat catastrophe. It turns out that it was the Montserrat catastrophe, a volcano threatening to erupt in the Caribbean. Hallmarks include , heart, HBC logo, ed.#, and Pc, with "P. Calvesbert" on the base. 1ST EDITION, NEVER DISPLAYED. THIS BOX WAS FROM THE FIRST RELEASE AND THE NOSE OF THE MOUSE INSIDE IS RED. THE FLIPPERS OF THE SEA LION ARE GREY. ARIA AMOROSE HAS NEVER BEEN DISPLAYED AND IS IN PRISTINE CONDITION, . SHIPPING, HANDLING AND INSURANCE, $7.00. ALL MY AUCTIONS YIELD NOTHING BUT THE BEST! GOOD LUCK!! This listing created by eBay Seller's Assistant Basic. Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Visit Suncookie today!
